title: Transfer Utility Service
description: A customer is moving from one address to another within the same service territory and wants to transfer their service.

tasks.description: Identify the customer's account and authenticate their identity.
Collect the new service address and the dates to stop service at the old address and start service at the new one.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately records the move-out and move-in dates and the new address.

tasks.description: Process the transfer request, which involves creating a stop order for the old address and a start order for the new one.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully submits both linked service orders.
